section.title: Alerts [with entries]
section.text: Chicken Pox Contact Brother was diagnosed with Chicken Pox on January 29th. Patient on isolation until February 7th.

observation.text: Patient has come in contact with brother who has a confirmed case of chicken-pox as of January 29th, 2012

observation.text: Lymphadenopathy, general malaise, fatigue, chest congestion, cough, decrease in appetite
Instructions to the patient: Take 2 tablets, 3 times a day with meals. If a dose is missed, do not take double the dose at the next meal; just skip that dose.
Total hip replacement prosthesis was implanted in 1998

observation.text: Lymphadenopathy, general malaise, fatigue, chest congestion, cough, decrease in appetite

list.item: Patient has recently had a hip-replacement (right).
This referral is to a physiotherapist who can assist the patient with walking again.
